thread.section_title: YourMechanic Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of YourMechanic | yourmechanic.com
thread.title: Celina Delgado

author: Celina Delgado
title: Celina Delgado
text: "Tyler was awesome he took the time to explain with pictures exactly what he did to my car and answered all my questions. I had other concerns with my car and he took the time to not only tell me what he thought it was but showed me. I will use your mechanic for all future car issues but I will only ask for Tyler as my mechanic! Excellent customer service and above all honest and knowledgeable mechanic!"
